interfaces.name: AS_GSS_TMG_BTN_manageImportReferenceTasksGridButtons
interfaces.description: Contains the button layout for the import task grid.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  /*The button layout, which can dynamically be inside a section or not*/
  /*Note that when using this pattern of storing an interface as a local variable, it must be set to refreshAlways = true*/
  local!noTasksToImport: rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!allImportedTasks),
  local!processInfo,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"(
    primaryButtons: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"(
        accessibilityText: "Press Enter to add items to process",
        label: "Add Tasks To Approach",
        saveInto: rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess(
          newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
            cdt: ri!allImportedTasks,
            field: "taskRefId",
            value: null
          ),
          objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskRef',
          objectDse: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_R_TASK_REF,
          auditDse: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_A_R_TASK_REF,
          auditConfig: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_ADT_BL_auditConfig_R_TaskRef(),
          processInfo: local!processInfo,
          onSuccess: {
            a!save(
              ri!selectedTemplate,
              'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_Template'(
                templateTasks: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: rule!AS_CO_UT_joinListsByField(
                    listOne: ri!allImportedTasks,
                    listTwo: local!processInfo.pv.auditParams.newObjects,
                    field: "taskName"
                  ),
                  expression: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CDT_mapTaskRefToTemplateTask(taskRef: fv!item)
                )
              )
            ),
            a!save(ri!selectedSubAction, 1),
            a!save(ri!importStep, 1),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(ri!taskImportDocument),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(ri!allImportedTasks)
          }
        ),
        style: "PRIMARY",
        validate: true,
        disabled: local!noTasksToImport
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"(
        accessibilityText: "Press Enter to add item",
        label: "Add Tasks",
        saveInto: rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess(
          newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
            cdt: ri!allImportedTasks,
            field: "taskRefId",
            value: null
          ),
          objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskRef',
          objectDse: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_R_TASK_REF,
          auditDse: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_A_R_TASK_REF,
          auditConfig: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_ADT_BL_auditConfig_R_TaskRef(),
          onSuccess: {
            a!save(ri!selectedSubAction, 1),
            a!save(ri!importStep, 1),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(ri!taskImportDocument),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(ri!allImportedTasks)
          }
        ),
        style: "PRIMARY",
        validate: true,
        disabled: local!noTasksToImport
      )
    },
    secondaryButtons: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"(
        accessibilityText: "Press Enter to go to previous step",
        label: "Back",
        saveInto: {
          rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(valueToNull: ri!allImportedTasks),
          a!save(ri!importStep, 1)
        },
        style: "NORMAL",
        validate: false
      )
    }
  )
)

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
  local!isStateOrLocal: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
  rule!AS_GSS_HCL_vendorsPage(
    header: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorsPageHeader(showWhen: true()),
    contents: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
        label: "Vendors",
        rowHeader: 1,
        borderStyle: "STANDARD",
        labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
        data: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD,
        columns: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "",
            sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.isActive,
            value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_isActive(
              isActive: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.isActive]
            ),
            align: "CENTER",
            width: "ICON"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "Name",
            sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.legalName,
            value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_vendorName(
              recordTitle: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.legalName],
              recordIdentifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            width: "MEDIUM"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "UEI",
            sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId,
            helpTooltip: "Unique Entity Identifier",
            value: if(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId]
              ),
              "-",
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId]
            ),
            width: "AUTO",
            showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "CAGE",
            sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode,
            helpTooltip: "Commercial and Government Entity Code",
            value: if(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode]
              ),
              "-",
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode]
            ),
            width: "NARROW",
            showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "TIN",
            sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.tin,
            helpTooltip: "Taxpayer Identification Number",
            value: if(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.tin]
              ),
              "-",
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.tin]
            ),
            width: "AUTO",
            showWhen: local!isStateOrLocal
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "FEIN",
            sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.fein,
            helpTooltip: "Federal Employer Identification Number",
            value: if(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.fein]
              ),
              "-",
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.fein]
            ),
            width: "AUTO",
            showWhen: local!isStateOrLocal
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "Status",
            sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.status,
            value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
              nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.status],
              replacementValue: "-"
            ),
            width: "NARROW",
            showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "Business Type",
            value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_businessType(
              businessType: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.businessType],
              businessTypeRecord: {}
            ),
            width: "MEDIUM_PLUS"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "Address",
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              value: if(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                  fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
                ),
                "-",
                rule!AS_GAM_UT_displayAddressAsEnvelope(
                  addressLine1: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
                  addressLine2: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
                  state: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorState.stateName],
                  city: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCity],
                  zipCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorZipCode],
                  zipCodeExt: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
                  foreignPostalCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
                  country: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCountry.countryName],
                  countryId: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCountry.countryId]
                )
              )
            ),
            width: "NARROW_PLUS"
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
            label: "Expiration Date",
            sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.expirationDate,
            value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
              nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.expirationDate],
              replacementValue: "-"
            ),
            align: "END",
            width: "NARROW_PLUS",
            showWhen: not(local!isStateOrLocal)
          )
        },
        validations: {},
        pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE,
        refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
        showSearchBox: true,
        showRefreshButton: true,
        showExportButton: true(),
        shadeAlternateRows: true()
      )
    }
  )
)

if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!choiceLabel,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayBooleanAsYesNo(bool: ri!value),
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxField"(

      label: null,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly

    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    choiceLabels: {ri!choiceLabel},
    choiceValues: {true},
    value: if(
      ri!value,
      {true},
      null
    ),
    saveInto: {a!save(ri!value, rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!value)),ri!additionalSaveIntos},
    showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: ri!validations,
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  )
)

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!showEvaluationLink: rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_GCW_LOGIC_displayRelatedEvaluationVisibilty(),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
    contents: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
        items: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
            item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
              value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayEvaluationRecordTitle(
                  evaluationNumber: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationNumber],
                  evaluationTitle: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationTitle]
                ),
                style: "STRONG"
              )
            )
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
            item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
              value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
                icon: "external-link",
                caption: "Opens in a new tab",

              ),

            ),
            width: "MINIMIZE",
            showWhen: local!showEvaluationLink
          )
        },
        marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
            icon: "calendar-o",
            caption: "Date Created",
            color: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
              brandingKey: "GrayThree",
              useSuiteBranding: true
            )
          ),
          " ",
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: datetext(
              ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdDatetime],
              "MMM dd, YYYY"
            ),
            color: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
              brandingKey: "GrayThree",
              useSuiteBranding: true
            )
          )
        }
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
        labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
        tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
          text: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refLabel],
          backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: a!match(
              value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refDataId],
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
              then: "GrayOne",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
              then: "BlueOne",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE,
              then: "GreenOne",
              default: null
            ),
            useSuiteBranding: true
          ),
          textColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: a!match(
              value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refDataId],
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
              then: "GrayFour",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
              then: "BlueTwo",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE,
              then: "GreenFour",
              default: null
            ),
            useSuiteBranding: true
          )
        ),
        size: "SMALL",

      )
    },
    link: rule!AS_GSS_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField(
      returnLinkComponent: true,
      recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD,
      recordIdentifier: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
      newTab: true,
      siteWebAddressIdentifier: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_TEXT_WEB_ADDRESS_IDENTIFIER,
      showLink: local!showEvaluationLink,
      sitePage: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_TEXT_SITE_PAGE_EVALUATION
    ),
    shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
    showBorder: false,
    showShadow: true,
    padding: "STANDARD",
    marginBelow: "STANDARD"

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!cardLayouts: a!refreshVariable(
    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!choiceValues,
      expression: a!localVariables(
        local!hasImage: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(index(ri!choiceImages, fv!index, null)),
        local!hasLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(index(ri!choiceLabels, fv!index, null)),
        local!hasInstructions: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(index(ri!choiceInstructions, fv!index, null)),
        local!itemLink: index(ri!choiceLinks, fv!index, null),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
          contents: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
              value: {
                cons!AS_CO_TXT_CARRIAGE_RETURN,
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                  text: upper(ri!choiceLabels[fv!index]),
                  showWhen: local!hasLabel,
                  color: "ACCENT",
                  size: "MEDIUM_PLUS",
                  style: "STRONG"
                )
              },
              align: "CENTER"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"(
              labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
              images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(
                document: ri!choiceImages[fv!index]
              ),
              showWhen: local!hasImage,
              align: "CENTER"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              value: {
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                  text: ri!choiceInstructions[fv!index],
                  showWhen: local!hasInstructions,
                  size: "SMALL"
                ),
                cons!AS_CO_TXT_CARRIAGE_RETURN,
                cons!AS_CO_TXT_CARRIAGE_RETURN
              },
              align: "CENTER"
            )
          },
          link: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!itemLink),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
              value: ri!choiceValues[fv!index],
              saveInto: ri!saveInto,
              showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!disabled)
            ),
            local!itemLink
          ),
          accessibilityText: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel(
            bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.acs_CardAsNavigation",
            arguments: ri!choiceLabels[fv!index]
          ),
        ),
      )
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),

  rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_cardsToGridStyleLayout_handler(
    cardLayouts: local!cardLayouts,
    maxPerRow: ri!maxPerRow,
    align: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!align, replacementValue: "CENTER"),
    columnWidth: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!columnWidth, replacementValue: "WIDE_PLUS")
  )
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
  type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskRef?list',
  value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!taskImportData.data,
    expression: a!localVariables(
      local!refTaskFieldValues: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_UT_mapImportTasksToReferenceTasks_ReturnFieldValues(
        importedTaskDictionary: fv!item,
        excelColumns: ri!excelColumns
      ),
      local!taskType: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskBehaviorType',
        value: displayvalue(
          local!refTaskFieldValues.taskBehaviorType.behaviorDisplayName,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!taskTypes,
            expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRefDataLabelSingle(
              singleData: fv!item,
              labelField: "behaviorDisplayName",
              i18nData: ri!i18nData
            )
          ),
          ri!taskTypes,
          null
        )
      ),
      local!documentType: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data',
        value: displayvalue(
          local!refTaskFieldValues.docUploadContext.docTypeId.refLabel,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!documentTypes,
            expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRefDataLabelSingle(
              singleData: fv!item,
              labelField: "refLabel",
              i18nData: ri!i18nData
            )
          ),
          ri!documentTypes,
          null
        )
      ),
      local!documentTemplate: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_DocumentTemplate',
        value: displayvalue(
          local!refTaskFieldValues.docUploadContext.docTemplate.documentName,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!documentTemplates,
            expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRefDataLabelSingle(
              singleData: fv!item,
              labelField: "documentName",
              i18nData: ri!i18nData
            )
          ),
          ri!documentTemplates,
          null
        )
      ),
      'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskRef'(
        taskRefId: null,
        taskName: local!refTaskFieldValues.taskName,
        taskBehaviorType: local!taskType,
        taskCategory: displayvalue(
          local!refTaskFieldValues.taskCategory.categoryName,
          ri!taskCategories.categoryName,
          ri!taskCategories,
          null
        ),
        defaultGroupAssignee: rule!AS_CO_UT_groupsByName(
          groupName: local!refTaskFieldValues.defaultGroupAssignee
        ),
        docUploadContext: if(
          contains(
            {
              cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENUM_TASK_BEHAVIOR_SUBTYPE_CODE_DOCUMENT_UPLOAD,
              cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENUM_TASK_BEHAVIOR_SUBTYPE_CODE_DOCUMENT_WITH_TEMPLATE
            },
            local!taskType.behaviorSubtypeCode
          ),
          'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskRef_DocUploadContext'(
            taskRefDocUploadContextId: null,
            docTypeId: local!documentType,
            docTemplate: if(
              local!taskType.behaviorSubtypeCode <> cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENUM_TASK_BEHAVIOR_SUBTYPE_CODE_DOCUMENT_WITH_TEMPLATE,
              null,
              local!documentTemplate
            )
          ),
          {}
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!selectedVendorsWithoutReferenceId: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
    records: ri!selectedVendors,
    field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
    values: { null }
  ),
  local!allMatchingExistingReferenceVendorRecords: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getReferenceVendors(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      index(
        local!selectedVendorsWithoutReferenceId,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
        null
      )
    ),
    additionalFilters: if(
      rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier,
        operator: "in",
        value: local!selectedVendorsWithoutReferenceId[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier],
        applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
          index(
            local!selectedVendorsWithoutReferenceId,
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier,
            null
          )
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier,
        operator: "in",
        value: local!selectedVendorsWithoutReferenceId[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier],
        applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
          index(
            local!selectedVendorsWithoutReferenceId,
            recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!allMatchingExistingReferenceVendorBusinessTypes: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getReferenceVendorBusinessTypes(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      index(
        local!allMatchingExistingReferenceVendorRecords,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
        null
      )
    ),
    vendorRefId: index(
      local!allMatchingExistingReferenceVendorRecords,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      null
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!selectedVendors,
    expression: if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId]
      ),
      a!localVariables(
        local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord: if(
          rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
          a!defaultValue(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
              records: local!allMatchingExistingReferenceVendorRecords,
              field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier,
              values: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.stateAndLocalIdentifier]
            ),
            null
          ),
          a!defaultValue(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
              records: local!allMatchingExistingReferenceVendorRecords,
              field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier,
              values: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.federalIdentifier]
            ),
            null
          )
        ),
        if(
          a!isNullOrEmpty(
            local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord
          ),
          fv!item,
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
            records: fv!item,
            modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId: local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId],
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName: a!defaultValue(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName],
                local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName]
              ),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode: a!defaultValue(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode],
                local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
              ),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId: a!defaultValue(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId],
                local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
              ),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin: a!defaultValue(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin],
                local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin]
              ),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein: a!defaultValue(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein],
                local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein]
              ),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status: a!defaultValue(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
                local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status]
              ),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate: a!defaultValue(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
                local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate]
              ),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId: a!defaultValue(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId],
                local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId]
              ),
              recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes: rule!AS_GSS_UT_constructSelectedBusinessTypes(
                originalRefVendorBusinessTypes: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
                  records: local!allMatchingExistingReferenceVendorBusinessTypes,
                  field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
                  values: local!matchingExistingReferenceVendorRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId]
                ),
                currentBusinessTypeCodes: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes.typeCode]
              )
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      fv!item
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BL_ShowFactorWeight_v1_default
expression_rules.description: This rule represents the visibilty to show or hide factor weights in the factors tab.Modify this rule to show/hide factor weight, as per need.

data.sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: This rule represents the visibilty to show or hide Factor weights in the factors tab.

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: Factor weights are always shown
    hide subfactor weights if user is assigned as an evaluator
    UNLESS they created the evaluation or are assigned as a super user on the evaluation/criteria/parent criteria
    OR are a member of a super user group
    assignments are not limited to the associated groups

CUSTOMIZATION STEPS:
1.Configure conditions accordingly and set which groups can able to see the factor weights.
See inline comments about what each field of the conditions represents .



EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Boolean

*/
and(
  ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired],
  /*
    factor weights are always shown
    hide subfactor weights if user is assigned as an evaluator
    UNLESS they created the evaluation or are assigned as a super user on the evaluation/criteria/parent criteria
    OR are a member of a super user group
  */
  or(
    isnull(
      ri!currentFactor[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.parentCriteriaId]
    ),
    not(
      contains(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_distinct(
          value: a!flatten(
            touniformstring(
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: ri!allFactors,
                expression: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.CriteriaAssignment.assignee]
              )
            )
          )
        ),
        tostring(ri!loggedInUser)
      )
    ),
    /*
      as of GSS 1.7, these assignments are not limited to the associated groups
      so we check separately from the groups memebership
    */
    contains(
      touniformstring(
        {
          ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy],
          ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationChief],
          ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.contractingOfficer],
          ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.contractingSpecialist],
          ri!currentFactor[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaChair]
        }
      ),
      tostring(ri!loggedInUser)
    ),
    /* super users groups */
    #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:isusermemberofgroup?okey=a!isUserMemberOfGroup"(
      username: ri!loggedInUser,
      matchAllGroups: false,
      groups: {
        cons!AS_GSS_GRP_CONTRACTING_PERSONNEL,
        cons!AS_GSS_GRP_FACTOR_ADVISOR,
        cons!AS_GSS_GRP_EVALUATION_CHAIRS
      }
    )
  )
)

rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION_RESPONSES,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation_Responses',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!responseId

      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters),

    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {

      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "responseId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!responseId

)

        refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_STRENGTH
      ),
      Response: " The vendor offers highly competitive pricing, providing excellent value for the proposed solution. ",
      Justification: " The vendor's pricing stands out as advantageous after a thorough analysis of industry benchmarks and multiple quotes from competing vendors. The cost-effectiveness is a significant strength that aligns with the government's goal of obtaining value for money.",
      isSignificant: true
    ),
    'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Consensus_Response'(
      isIncluded: true,
      isActive: true,
      responseType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
        refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_STRENGTH
      ),
      Response: " The vendor's pricing model includes favorable terms for long-term contracts, though this may not significantly impact the current acquisition cycle. The benefit becomes more evident in extended partnerships.",
      Justification: " While the strength lies in favorable terms for long-term contracts, the impact may not be significant for the current acquisition cycle. However, this advantage becomes more pronounced when considering extended partnerships, making it a strategic strength for future engagements.",

    ),
    'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Consensus_Response'(
      isIncluded: true,
      isActive: true,
      responseType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
        refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_WEAKNESS
      ),
      Response: " The vendor's pricing structure lacks transparency, making it challenging to ascertain the breakdown of costs and evaluate the reasonableness of individual line items. This lack of clarity may hinder effective cost control and monitoring.",
      Justification: " The weakness lies in the vendor's failure to provide a clear and transparent breakdown of their pricing. Without a detailed understanding of costs, it becomes difficult for the government to manage expenses and assess the reasonableness of the pricing structure.",
      isSignificant: true
    ),
    'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Consensus_Response'(

This highlights a potential misunderstanding or oversight on the vendor's part, impacting their ability to meet the financial requirements outlined in the acquisition.",

    )
  },

      isIncluded: true,
      isActive: true,
      responseType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
        refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_WEAKNESS
      ),
      Response: " The vendor's pricing structure lacks transparency, making it challenging to ascertain the breakdown of costs and evaluate the reasonableness of individual line items. This lack of clarity may hinder effective cost control and monitoring.",
      Justification: " The weakness lies in the vendor's failure to provide a clear and transparent breakdown of their pricing. Without a detailed understanding of costs, it becomes difficult for the government to manage expenses and assess the reasonableness of the pricing structure.",
      isSignificant: true
    ),
    'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Consensus_Response'(
      isIncluded: true,
      isActive: true,
      responseType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
        refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_WEAKNESS
      ),
      Response: " The vendor's pricing is competitive, but their reliance on a single-source supplier for key components introduces a weakness in supply chain resilience. This potential risk may lead to cost fluctuations and availability issues.",
      Justification: " Although the vendor's pricing is competitive, the weakness arises from their dependence on a single-source supplier for critical components. This introduces a supply chain risk, potentially leading to cost fluctuations and availability issues that could impact the overall reliability of the solution.",
      
    ),
    'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Consensus_Response'(
      isIncluded: true,
      isActive: true,
      responseType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
        refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_DEFICIENCY
      ),
      Response: " The vendor's initial proposal does not align with the government's budget constraints, indicating a deficiency in their understanding of the financial parameters set forth in the acquisition requirements.",
      Justification: " The deficiency is evident in the vendor's failure to align their proposal with the specified budget constraints. This highlights a potential misunderstanding or oversight on the vendor's part, impacting their ability to meet the financial requirements outlined in the acquisition.",
      
    )
  },
  vendor: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor'(legalName: "Test Vendor")
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_AM_getEvaluationDetailsBySolicPiid_V1
expression_rules.description: Returns the evaluation details

data.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!solicitationPiid),
  null,
  a!localVariables(
    local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
      value: now(),
      refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
    ),
    local!evaluation: rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
      recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD,
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationNumber,
          operator: "=",
          value: left(
            ri!solicitationPiid,
            cons!AS_GSS_INT_MAX_CHARACTERS_FOR_EVALUATION_NUMBER
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.sourceApplication.refDataId,
          operator: "=",
          value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_AM
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.isActive,
          operator: "=",
          value: true()
        ),

      },
      fields: {
        recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationNumber,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationTitle,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdDatetime,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refLabel,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refDataId,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.sourceApplication
      },
      triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
      executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!solicitationPiid),
      returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
    ),
    if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
        value: local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId]
      ),
      a!map(),
      a!map(
        evaluationId: local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
        solicitationPiid: local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationNumber],
        title: local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationTitle],
        status: local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refLabel],
        statusBranding: a!map(
          bgColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: a!match(
              value: local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refDataId],
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
              then: "GrayOne",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
              then: "BlueOne",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE,
              then: "GreenOne",
              default: null
            ),
            useSuiteBranding: true
          ),
          textColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: a!match(
              value: local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refDataId],
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
              then: "GrayFour",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
              then: "BlueTwo",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE,
              then: "GreenFour",
              default: null
            ),
            useSuiteBranding: true
          )
        ),
        createdOn: datetext(
          local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdDatetime],
          "MMM dd, YYYY"
        ),
        evaluationLink: rule!AS_CO_UT_urlForRecord(
          recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD,
          recordId: local!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
          siteWebAddressIdentifier: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_TEXT_WEB_ADDRESS_IDENTIFIER,
          sitePage: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_TEXT_SITE_PAGE_EVALUATION
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_FRM_getBrandingValueByKey
expression_rules.description: Returns a branding value from the branding configuration file by its key. Checks both _custom and _default branding files.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!brandingConfigs: getbrandingconfig(ri!defaultBrandingConfigDoc, true),

  local!defaultValue: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.key),
    local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.value,
    null
  ),

  local!customValue: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.customBranding.key),
    local!brandingConfigs.customBranding.value,
    null
  ),

  local!type: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.key),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.type),
    null
  ),

  local!returnValue: if(
    isnull(local!customValue),
    local!defaultValue,
    local!customValue
  ),

  local!castReturnValue: if(
    contains({"IMAGE", "FAVICON"}, local!type),
    todocument(local!returnValue),
    local!returnValue
  ),

  local!castReturnValue
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!brandingConfigs: getbrandingconfig(ri!defaultBrandingConfigDoc, true),
  
  local!defaultValue: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.key),
    local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.value,
    null
  ),
  
  local!customValue: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.customBranding.key),
    local!brandingConfigs.customBranding.value,
    null
  ),
  
  local!type: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.key),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.type),
    null
  ),
  
  local!returnValue: if(
    isnull(local!customValue),
    local!defaultValue,
    local!customValue
  ),
  
  local!castReturnValue: if(
    contains({"IMAGE", "FAVICON"}, local!type),
    todocument(local!returnValue),
    local!returnValue
  ),
  
  local!castReturnValue
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_FontDetailsForEmailTemplate_v1_default

data.sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: This rule represents the configuration of fontDetails of the Email.
Modify this rule to change the Font Details of the Email.

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: Font family Arial, with size 18px, background color transparent, and font color #000000.

CUSTOMIZATION STEPS: Configure font details by changing the map configuration below.
See inline comments about what each field of the map represents.


EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Map, with fields `fontFamily`, `fontSize`, `backgroundColor` and `fontColor`

*/
a!map(
  /* Give any valid font family like the ones that are stated below:
    "Arial",
    "Verdana",
    "Helvetica",
    "Tahoma",
    "Trebuchet MS",
    "Times New Roman",
    "Georgia",
    "Garamond",
    "Courier New",
    "Brush Script MT"
  */
  fontFamily: "Arial",

  /* Give any valid positive number adding px at the end. E.g., "10px" */
  fontSize: "18px",

  /* Give any valid Hex color code. E.g., red is "#FF0000" */
  backgroundColor: "TRANSPARENT",

  /* Give any valid Hex color code. E.g., red is "#FF0000" */
  fontColor: "#000000"
)
data.definition:

See inline comments about what each field of the map represents.


EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Map, with fields `fontFamily`, `fontSize`, `backgroundColor` and `fontColor`

*/
a!map(
  /* Give any valid font family like the ones that are stated below:
    "Arial",
    "Verdana",
    "Helvetica",
    "Tahoma",
    "Trebuchet MS",
    "Times New Roman",
    "Georgia",
    "Garamond",
    "Courier New",
    "Brush Script MT"
  */
  fontFamily: "Arial",
  
  /* Give any valid positive number adding px at the end. E.g., "10px" */
  fontSize: "18px",

  /* Give any valid Hex color code. E.g., red is "#FF0000" */
  backgroundColor: "TRANSPARENT",
  
  /* Give any valid Hex color code. E.g., red is "#FF0000" */

)
